name: Sniper Shoot:Bank Robbers Gang
description:
Sniper Shoot:Bank Robbers Gangster is an action and shooting game where you have to save the city bank from evil robbers just act like a superhero. This city bank is under big threat and this is your police duty to rescue bank and save all gold coins and people money. Fight against the bank robbers who are prison escape evil criminals. Use variety of modern guns to strike down all the gangster members like a super hero.
Feature
Variety of guns.
Smooth controls.
Outstanding sounds effects.
Addictive mission of bank robbery.
Amazing graphics with 3D environment.
Easy to understand challenging to play.
